inputs.name: apiModel
inputs.label: API Model
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the apimodel file to run AKS-Engine. Note: File must be in json format.

inputs.name: caCertificatePath
inputs.label: CA Certificate Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the CA certificate to generate certificates for the Kubernetes cluster. CA certificate must be in a PEM format.

inputs.name: caCertificateKeyPath
inputs.label: CA Certificate Key Path
inputs.helpMarkDowm: Path to the CA certificate key file to generate certificates for the Kubernetes cluster. Key file must be in a PEM format.

inputs.name: setValue
inputs.label: Set Values
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set values in api model in the command line. Supports multiple key/value pairs separated with commas: key1=value1,key2=value2

inputs.name: outputDirectory
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to store the file needed to deploy the Kubernetes cluster. Default is current directory/_output

inputs.name: newNodeCount
inputs.label: New Node Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the number of nodes when scaling out or down. Must not be equal to the current number of nodes.

inputs.name: clusterIPAddress
inputs.label: Cluster IP Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the IP Address of the Kubernetes cluster. This is required when scaling the cluster out or down.

inputs.name: authMethod
inputs.label: Authentication Method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication method to use when running AKS-Engine command line tools. client_secert is the default and will need to provide the service principal id and secert.

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure service principal client id. This will be used to create and configure Azure resources when deploying the Kubernetes cluster. Service principal must have Contributor role assignment on resource group to deploy a cluster.

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure service principal client secert. This will be the generated secret provided when creating the service principal.

inputs.name: subscription
inputs.label: Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure subscription id to deploy the Kubernetes cluster.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure resource group to deploy the Kubernetes cluster.

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure region to deploy the Kubernetes cluster.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run aks-engine.exe in debug model for more verbose output.
